filter.name: name
filter.label: Name
filter.description: Case in-sensitive search across name fields
filter.aql: name matches anywhere ignore-case '$${name}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/title) starts with ignore-case '$${name}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/name) starts with ignore-case '$${name}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/title) starts with ignore-case '$${name}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/name) starts with ignore-case '$${name}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.place.of.interest:cataloging/name) starts with ignore-case '$${name}$$' or xpath(mf-name/name) starts with ignore-case '$${name}$$'
